Fighters.Name: Moon Knight
Fighters.Text:
##### Moon Knight
At the start of your turn, move up to 2 spaces.

##### Khonshu
Khonshu adds +2 to the value of his attack cards. He does not take damage from effects other than combat damage.

##### Mr. Knight
Mr. Knight adds +1 to all his defense values.

At the end of your turn, change to your next identity (In order, Moon Knight -> Khonshu -> Mr. Knight, repeating).

Fighters.Name: Khonshu
Fighters.Text:
##### Moon Knight
At the start of your turn, move up to 2 spaces.

##### Khonshu
Khonshu adds +2 to the value of his attack cards. He does not take damage from effects other than combat damage.

##### Mr. Knight
Mr. Knight adds +1 to all his defense values.

At the end of your turn, change to your next identity (In order, Moon Knight -> Khonshu -> Mr. Knight, repeating).

Fighters.Name: Mr. Knight
Fighters.Text:
##### Moon Knight
At the start of your turn, move up to 2 spaces.

##### Khonshu
Khonshu adds +2 to the value of his attack cards. He does not take damage from effects other than combat damage.

##### Mr. Knight
Mr. Knight adds +1 to all his defense values.

At the end of your turn, change to your next identity (In order, Moon Knight -> Khonshu -> Mr. Knight, repeating).

Card.Name: I'm Not Real
Card.Text: After combat: You may change to your next identity.

Card.Name: That's Why I Always Win
Card.Key: Moon Knight_That's Why I Always Win
Card.Text: During combat: You may BOOST this attack.

Card.Name: We're All In This Together
Card.Key: Moon Knight_We're All In This Together
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, draw 1 card.

Card.Name: Good Enough For Us
Card.Text: After combat: You may draw 2 cards. If you do, take 2 damage.

Card.Name: That's The Part I Like
Card.Key: Moon Knight_That's The Part I Like
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, you may look at the top 3 cards of your opponent's deck and discard one of them. Place the other 2 back in any order.

Card.Name: Fist of Khonshu
Card.Text: After combat: If you won the combat, move the opposing fighter up to 4 spaces.

Card.Name: Let Your Insanity Guide You
Card.Key: Moon Knight_Let Your Insanity Guide You
Card.Text: After combat: Discard the top card of your deck. Draw cards equal to that card's BOOST value.

Card.Name: Past and Present Intermingle
Card.Text: During combat: Add the BOOST value of the top card of your discard pile to this card's value.

Card.Name: A Totally Sane Thing To Do
Card.Key: Moon Knight_A Totally Sane Thing To Do
Card.Text: After combat: You may deal 2 damage to both fighters in the combat.
Card.Script: ../Moon Knight/A Totally Sane Thing To Do.lua

Card.Name: Feint
Card.Text: Immediately: Cancel all effects on your opponent's card.

Card.Name: Madness Will Keep You Alive
Card.Key: Moon Knight_Madness Will Keep You Alive
Card.Text:
Recover 2 health.
If you started your turn in a different space, gain 1 action.

Card.Name: Travelers of The Night
Card.Text:
Move your fighter up to 4 spaces. They may move through opposing fighters.
Gain 1 action.
